title: EzInbox Question
content:
Alright... so whenever I log into the PCKF, in the upper right corner of the main board page, it lets me know that I'm logged in as XkyRauh2001, and offers to let me view my EzInbox. Clicking on that link brings me to the Inbox, obviously, and in the upper left corner of that new screen, there should be a link that says "back to: Public Commander Keen Forum," because that's where I came from, right?

Does it actually say that for you guys?

Because my EzInbox evidently thinks I've been visiting some... less family-oriented sites. O_o; I'll post a screenshot if I'm the only one with a funky EzInbox. What've you guys got on yours?

title: Re: EzInbox Question
content: Mine comes up with a "System Updates" page telling me there are no updates at this time, and at the top there's a link to go back to the "help forums" - not even any mention of the PCKF.

title: Re: EzInbox Question
content:
It works just fine for me as well... although I have to admit it had some strange quirks in the past.
I think I was changing my settings or something, in other words moving away from a forum, and once I checked in the corner, the link was for a forum that wasn't the last I visited.
It was a forum I visited though, just not the most recent one.
Probably a small bug that pops up reading from a database incorrectly.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
